alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 5:51PM CDT until April 29 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Platte, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Platte, Brady, Maxwell, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Keith, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Birdwood and Vroman. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 170 and 208. Highway 83 between mile markers 69 and 105. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
